name: Sokobear: Goo
description:
Goo is everywhere, the slimy monsters have taken control, but the Forest Folk want their home back! Bear must deal with the creatures that have spread around 40 places in the woods. Let them eat goo and explode!

Give the Goos a taste if their own medicine.

Figure out the correct way to push this slime around. You don't want to miss the opportunity to explode some Goo!

Some Goos are stronger. They need more incentive to go boom!

Nobody wants a slimey neighbourhood, so it's best to get to work!
